name: Leaktastic
description:
Leaktastic

Your cave is leaking! Use the bricks to plug up and repair the leaks. Throw bricks at the flowing water to stop the flooding.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2020; the theme was "repair".  

Controls

Click "Run Game" and then click in the viewport to start playing.

Jump - Z
Throw Block - X
Move - Arrow Keys

Upon game over, press `Z` to restart.

Credits

By Ross Glashan and Alice Wang
Music Consultation and Dinners: Jordan Mecom
Tileset: Cavernas
